name: Detective Justin Case
description:
Justin Case is a young man in Langden Heath who comes from a family of respected detectives. He is eager to show that he's of the same metal as his family.  When Justin's father retires from the Langden Heath Police Department, Justin is hired to replace him. Now Justin has his chance to build his reputation as a skilled and respectable detective just like his father.

As the player, you control Justin Case while on assignments. During the assignment you as the player will be charged with finding and interpret evidence, to find out who of the given suspects commited the crime.

This is a demo of the game currently being developed. During this demo you will be able to play a tutorial and the first mission. Hopefully you will enjoy it.
